mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LODGING ( CONTENT_ID, LODGING_EXP, CHECK_IN, CHECK_OUT, PARKING, ELEVATOR ) VALUES ( #{contentId}, #{lodgingExp}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{parking}, #{elevator} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_LODGING SET LODGING_EXP = #{lodgingExp}, CHECK_IN = #{checkIn}, CHECK_OUT = #{checkOut}, PARKING = #{parking}, ELEVATOR = #{elevator} WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID AS contentId, LODGING_EXP AS lodgingExp, CHECK_IN AS checkIn, CHECK_OUT AS checkOut, PARKING AS parking, ELEVATOR AS elevator FROM TB_LODGING WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
